name: THE EILA GROUP
goal:
RAPPRESENTANZA DI INTERESSI PER CLIENTI PRIVATI, ASSOCIAZIONI O PER CONTO DI ALTRI CONSULENTI SENZA BASE DI LAVORO A BRUXELLES, FORMAZIONE PROFESSIONALE E ACCADEMICA DIRETTA E IN CONTO TERZI.
MONITORAGGIO LEGISLATIVO E PARLAMETARE DELLE ISTITUZIONI EUROPEE.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Youth
